html:
9.7.18  11:36 pm   are you real, or just another dream?

     can i be the first dream

9.7.18  11:27 pm   So when you refer to the "Mountain" in both Hi I'm Steve and I'm Best Friends With my Front Door, are you referring to your career as a song writer?

     it is not specified. it's what i call a UM (unspecified mountain)

9.7.18  11:09 pm   hi bill, on question timestamp 8.30.18  7:45 pm , the answer doesn't make sense. Care to elaborate? 

     making things up, writing, songwriting, videos, ..... there are infinite things to be said and done. there are infinite things to be written. the game of making things up is simply never ending

9.7.18  11:07 pm   hi Bill, i'm wondering if you'd every preform your music somewhere in your life. i'd come if you do and i'm sure many would too :) if public speaking/preforming isn't your thing i understand

     it is but i need to get a wild head start on the song/video products because i can't make those while i am touring

9.7.18  11:05 pm   I always thought the lyrics of the song song were about song writing, is front door in the same vein? Meaning the lyrics are about your experiences writing songs/making content/doing what you do.

     it could be about anything, but it very strongly reflects the situation at hand

9.7.18  10:47 pm   have you ever eaten an elephant and if so how did you survive

     i am elephant

9.7.18  10:34 pm   do you have any ongoing projects other than youtube and life?

     youtube is not my project. i believe it is google's project now

9.7.18  9:09 pm   If you went on tour, I'd like to see a live book stacking event

     i think you are bluffing

9.7.18  8:51 pm   I HAD A WHOLE BUNCH OF STUFF I NEEDED TO DO TODAY AND I DID IT!!! GOD I LOVE GETTING SHIT D O N E!!! I HOPE YOU GET SHIT DONE ALSO TODAY!!!!

     oh that's what i'm talking about

9.7.18  8:45 pm   how'd your thing go that's happening in four hours and fifteen minutes at the time of my writing this

     good

9.7.18  8:41 pm   how to have more important (and true) realizations faster

     you need to fully absorb the ones you have already had. if you have realizations too fast they all start to collapse

9.7.18  8:30 pm   Do you think school needs to be changed

If so what

     each person must design their own school how they want. if you find yourself wanting to change someone else's school, that's when it's about time to start thinking about your own school

9.7.18  7:19 pm   How do you think the middle man feels about being cut out all the time? 

     bad but hopefully rich from all that time spent in the middle

9.7.18  6:46 pm   i really like some of your songs like "You're Free To Do Whatever You Want To" and "im crazy/its raining" but they're not on spotify. why/can you add them?

     sure

9.7.18  4:45 pm   Hello, I would like to ask you an advice abouton the title of my book. Can I include the word "Destiny" or it is banal?

     i think i would need to know the entire contents of the book to make an informed decision

9.7.18  4:23 pm   when did you write the front door song?

     8.24.18

     is there sheet music?

     no

9.7.18  4:19 pm   i've noticed that you talk about "cops" and arresting or getting arrested. You have a clean record, right?

     i am cops

9.7.18  3:52 pm   what are some stupid things to do on the weekend

     destroy the universe

9.7.18  3:50 pm   What's with all the neon

     it is mostly not found on earth because it is chemically unable to afix itself to solid objects

9.7.18  3:49 pm   Which political party do you follow?

     is there one that can include everyone

9.7.18  3:40 pm   Please leak us some conversations from the secretive: the group DM of popular accounts.

     i am not in one, but i frequently get added to DM groups of unpopular accounts

9.7.18  2:57 pm   Joy, rage, sadness, fear, I get all these can be creative fuels with unique uses. But what about tiredness and disinterest? I've never been able to get them to work in any engine so to speak. Have you ever harnessed em?

     no, but if you are tired you can sleep, and if you are 'disinterested' you should try to specify what you are disinterested in. then get away from that thing and find what you are interested in

9.7.18  2:52 pm   Bill why do you use Rogers for your cell provider

     i don't

9.7.18  2:37 pm   Do you spy on me to determine the best song for my current emotional state once every month?

     no but perhaps you share the same emotional state as me

9.7.18  2:34 pm   Bill, what's a creative way of dealing with long rides on public transport?

     write

9.7.18  2:30 pm   can I take church gigs if I'm not religious?

     if you can get away with it, please do. it will make you awesome

9.7.18  2:20 pm   are you interested for potential interview?

     i prefer a real ones, but i am already doing an ongoing one right here

9.7.18  2:19 pm   what schedule did you set for your next video?

     it's the same one as the previous. but with this weird speed bump in the middle

9.7.18  2:15 pm   my friend is sad. i asked them what was wrong and they said "nothing" but i can tell they're sad. i dont want to pry as i feel like it would only make things sadder. any tips on making my friend happy again?

     you're going to want to hire a detective

9.7.18  2:14 pm   do you ever tape avocados to your back and pretend that you are a snail bill

     no

9.7.18  1:22 pm   bill help i dropped my bread

     well you gotta pick it up and put it back on the horse

9.7.18  12:55 pm   bill i cant believe what i did... i forgot to make sure my song was ok without the bass. i just listened to it on my phone and i was like oh no what do i do now????? i should have checked from the beginniing. now i know. i just have to figure out how to fix this problem now, it sounds very empty when i listen on my phone and i'm not sure how to fill that space

     there's really nothing you can do now. if you really want to make sure that doesn't happen, you need to be checking it that way from the very beginning. try making an EQ setting on the master (or mix buss) that simulates the phone speaker. play a song on your phone and load up the same song in your session. tweak the eq until it sounds the same. hint: it will probably look like this. then just bypass it and unbypass it and that's your phone simulator

9.7.18  12:54 pm   How did you film the construction hat thing for Hallelujah?

     very precariously. it is too small for my head, and does not stay on, i had to stay balanced very carefully if i wanted it to stay on, but it kept falling off

9.7.18  12:38 pm   Why are there never videos of you playing real drums? 

     because other people live in the building and real drums are insanely loud

9.7.18  12:28 pm   Bill, just how many twitter accounts do you have?!

     1

9.7.18  11:25 am   How can someone who constantly thinks of things in terms of what could or will possibly happen in the future; live in the moment that is now?

     you could try getting more "physical"

9.7.18  11:17 am   I tried to go to outer space but didn't have enough resources. What do I do now?

     gather resources?

9.7.18  11:15 am   collaboration kinda sucks i guess, how do i overcome this

     do-it-yourself

9.7.18  10:56 am   Why does Christmas Season start earlier and earlier each year?

     to hopefully one day achieve the end goal of getting it to last 12 months

9.7.18  10:50 am   Do you have advice for someone who is deathly scared of accidental plagiarism?

     i would say google it but really i don't think you should. if you google anything relatively small and simple, you will probably find someone else who has said it before. this will make you doubt yourself away from doing it, when really it's probably fine. it could be a really obscure mention you just found. i think you should think what you want and say what you want. in plagiarism court cases, they are supposed to prove access, and prove that you have seen or heard the thing. so if you really said what you said without seeing or hearing the thing, then you should be ok. you also don't get in any trouble unless the thing you are doing gets really famous. so in that way you can use 'murphy's law' in your favor

9.7.18  10:45 am   Is the mortal enemy of a door; the lock that keeps it from opening?

     no, that would be the mortal enemy of a person who's life depends on getting to the other side

9.7.18  10:43 am   do you ever feel as if these questions are written by one guy 

     no

9.7.18  10:40 am   If you pause the game right before you lose, do you win or do you lose?

     it depends if you know any escape codes to use at that time

9.7.18  9:23 am   Is red blue, and yellow green?

     somehow i doubt it

If so why don't you believe me

9.7.18  8:53 am   How does music make me feel an emotion? Why is this music thing a part of our brains? I'm not objecting or anything, but I am curious.

     it takes some of the raw elements we and our world are made of, and exploits and plays with them

9.7.18  8:14 am   how do you feel about the people who comment how inspiring and positive your music is and how even when they're depressed listening to your music makes them feel like they can do anything?

     good, very nice

9.7.18  8:05 am   do you think you'll ever do a serious tutorial on how you make your videos?

     it's always different, but yes. it's more likely to be about how i made one i already made

9.7.18  7:39 am   Loving the new song. Probably one of my favorite songs of yours. I love the fact that you completed it in just two weeks and there's nothing I would change about the song, but what about you? If you had just a few days more to work on it, what would you have added/improved?

     the mix didn't get the same level of attention as it did in the previous songs. there's probably too much of a general bulge around 200hz. to fix that you just have to crawl thru every instrument and figure out what to cut, and when. actually on the last 2 songs i went through the vocal and made very specific eq cuts custom to each word. it made a big difference especially for the car, because the car system is very volatile and sensitive. i didn't have time to do any of that. but, i did do what's absolutely necessary. in fact, when you have limited time, sometimes you resort to arrangement changes if something is not working. for example, the "not gonna happen" section was muddy and lumpy as hell, and normally i probably would have gone crazy cutting frequencies from vocals, background vocals, instruments, really just slaved over it. but instead i went back in and just added some drums, made some quicker fixes which might have had more impact. the important thing is, if you stay working on it too long, self doubt starts to set in

9.7.18  7:38 am   Are you worried you'll get burnt out or produce less quality by setting dates for your songs?

     the opposite

9.7.18  7:13 am   How much can you bench press?

     20 benches but that's with a cheat code
